results.title: Metformin limits osteoarthritis development and progression through activation of AMPK signalling
results.text_hl: The present study suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, administered shortly after @<m>DISEASE_Elbow_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000092464 @@@joint injury@@@, can limit @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ development and progression in injury-induced @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ animal models.

citations.NLM: Li J, Zhang B, Liu WX, Lu K, Pan H, Wang T, Oh CD, Yi D, Huang J, Zhao L, Ning G, Xing C, Xiao G, Liu-Bryan R, Feng S, Chen D. Metformin limits osteoarthritis development and progression through activation of AMPK signalling Ann Rheum Dis. 2020 May;79(5):635-645. PMID: 32156705
